author.organization: National Institute of Information and Communications Technology

abstract.t: This document specifies a chunking protocol for dividing a user payload into CCNx Content Objects. It defines a name segment type to identify each sequential chunk number and a Content Object field to identify the last available chunk number. This includes specification for the naming convention to use for the chunked payload and a field added to a Content Object to represent the last chunk of an object. This document updates RFC8569 and RFC8609.
